ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND( Overlap_Customer__c = FALSE, NOT(ISBLANK(OverlapVOSSFDAccountNumber__c)) ), AND( At_Risk_Issues__c = FALSE, NOT(ISBLANK(At_Risk_Issues_Description__c)) ), AND( Corporate_Account__c = FALSE, NOT(ISBLANK(Corporate_Account_Description__c)) ), AND( Enterprise_Account__c = FALSE, NOT(ISBLANK(Enterprise_Street_Description__c)) ), AND( Local_Account__c = FALSE, NOT(ISBLANK(Local_Account_Description__c)) ), AND( Saalfeld__c = FALSE, NOT(ISBLANK(Saalfeld_Description__c)) ), AND( MLA_Account__c = FALSE, NOT(ISBLANK(Party_NAID__c)) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You have entered a description without the corresponding checkbox. Please either check the corresponding box or remove the description.
